DocumentSelectionchange_event.summary: The selectionchange event of the Selection API is fired when the current of a is changed.

remarks.para: This event is not cancelable and does not bubble.
The event can be handled by adding an event listener for selectionchange or using the onselectionchange event handler.

blockquote.para: Note: This event is not quite the same as the selectionchange events fired when the text selection in an {{HTMLElement("input")}} or {{HTMLElement("textarea")}} element is changed. See for more details.
